description: This file implements core functions for processing, examining, and serializing HTTP messages, including handling headers and message bodies within an HTTP server or client component. It defines functions to examine incoming payloads, process buffer descriptors, close message processing, produce outgoing messages, and serialize headers and bodies. It also manages message states and transitions during HTTP communication.

methods.name: ULONG HttpBmoExamine(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Examines incoming payload data and updates message state accordingly, handling header completeness and message body processing status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoProcess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo)
methods.description: Processes a buffer descriptor object during HTTP message receipt, handling header parsing, body processing, and state transitions based on message completeness and pipelining.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoCloseUp(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo)
methods.description: Finalizes message processing upon closing the connection or completing message receipt, managing cleanup and state updates.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoProduce(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Synthesizes a complete HTTP message from internal state, headers, and body, copying data into output buffer.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoOutputHeaders(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSerializeContext)
methods.description: Serializes the current HTTP headers into the output stream, either from stored buffer descriptors or by copying header data.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoOutputBody(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSerializeContext)
methods.description: Serializes the HTTP message body, handling chunked transfer encoding if necessary.

methods.name: void HttpBmoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Sends the final chunk in chunked transfer encoding, indicating completion of message transmission.
